roleset.name: cause angst, experiencing angst

role.descr: target of frustration (if in addition to arg0)

example.name: frustrate-v: would this actually work?
example.text: Sometimes , if the hacker seemed to be into a sensitive file , he would drag his keychain across the terminal to create static or slow the system down to frustrate his quarry .

example.name: frustrated-j: passive
example.text: Corporate leaders , frustrated by double - digit increases in health - care costs , are beginning to sound like liberal Democrats .

propbank.arg: by double - digit increases in health - care costs

example.name: frustrated-j
example.text: But the Fed is n't enthusiastic about Treasury efforts to bring down the value of the dollar through intervention in foreign - exchange markets , and the Treasury is frustrated at the Fed 's reluctance to cut interest rates to pull down the dollar 's value .

propbank.arg: at the Fed 's reluctance to cut interest rates to pull down the dollar 's value

example.name: frustrating-j
example.text: Cutting the pieces by hand with scissors was so frustrating to her

propbank.arg: Cutting the pieces by hand with scissors

example.name: frustration-n: both args
example.text: Democratic frustration with the Reagan victories and Court appointments , the contingency plans in place , and Mr. Bork ' spaper trail of vulnerable writings

propbank.arg: with the Reagan victories and Court appointments , the contingency plans in place , and Mr. Bork ' spaper trail of vulnerable writings

example.name: frustration-n: arg 1 only
example.text: their brotherly love , resentment , frustration , rage

roleset.note: FRUSTRATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'frustrate' based on wsj; adjectival 'frustrating' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1 (from frustrate.01-v)
FRUSTRATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to frustrate.01. Vn class amuse-31.1. Framed by Katie. (from frustration.01-n)
FRUSTRATED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from frustrated.01-j)
FRUSTRATING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from frustrating.01-j)
This is a comparison to frustrate.01, however arg 2, target has been deleted. This is because arg 0 covers this and it is not possible to have both arguments. (from frustration.01-n)
